leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算化学-量化计算与工作流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 求解→批量运行→解析/后处理→验证→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 求解器 + 工作流/调度 + 解析器

queries: [WEB] HPC software build system chemistry github
[WEB] singularity containers for quantum chemistry github

tools.name: ACCESS-OM2
tools.one_line_profile: Global coupled ocean-sea ice model for climate research
tools.detailed_description: ACCESS-OM2 is a global coupled ocean-sea ice model configuration used for climate research, developed by the ACCESS-NRI. It couples the MOM5 ocean model with the CICE sea ice model via OASIS3-MCT.

tools.name: mSSA
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Singular Spectrum Analysis for time series forecasting and imputation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Multivariate Singular Spectrum Analysis (mSSA), a non-parametric method for time series analysis, forecasting, and missing value imputation, widely used in geophysical and climatic data analysis.

tools.name: Batch Shipyard
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for provisioning and executing HPC workloads on Azure Batch
tools.detailed_description: Batch Shipyard is a tool to help provision, execute, and manage containerized High Performance Computing (HPC) and batch workloads on Azure Batch, supporting various scientific frameworks and MPI.

tools.name: PiGx
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of reproducible genomics analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: PiGx is a collection of genomics pipelines (RNA-seq, ChIP-seq, BS-seq, scRNA-seq) that are reproducible and easy to use, leveraging Guix for package management and reproducibility.

tools.name: PiGx RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for bulk RNA-seq data processing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A specific pipeline within the PiGx ecosystem for processing bulk RNA-seq data, performing quality control, alignment, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: Swineherd
tools.one_line_profile: Manager for Guix System containers in scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to manage GNU Guix System containers, facilitating reproducible environments for the PiGx genomics pipelines and other scientific workflows.

tools.name: HPK
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge for running Kubernetes applications on HPC Slurm clusters
tools.detailed_description: HPK (HPC-Kubernetes) allows users to run Kubernetes-native applications within an HPC environment by translating deployments to Slurm jobs and Singularity/Apptainer containers.

tools.name: ChangeMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing change detection model based on Mamba architecture
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for remote sensing change detection that utilizes the Spatio-Temporal State Space Model (Mamba) to capture temporal dependencies in multi-temporal satellite imagery.

tools.name: cotainr
tools.one_line_profile: User-space container builder for Apptainer/Singularity in HPC
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows users to build Apptainer/Singularity containers in user space on HPC systems without requiring root privileges, facilitating reproducible scientific environments.

tools.name: E4S à la carte (e4s-alc)
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for customizing E4S scientific container images
tools.detailed_description: E4S-alc allows users to customize existing container images by adding system packages and Spack packages, tailored for the Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack (E4S).

tools.name: E4S Container Launcher (e4s-cl)
tools.one_line_profile: Container manager for executing MPI applications in E4S containers
tools.detailed_description: A tool to simplify the launch of MPI applications inside E4S containers on HPC systems, handling library injection and MPI compatibility.

tools.name: VM-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Vision Mamba UNet for Medical Image Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A medical image segmentation model integrating the Mamba (State Space Model) architecture into a UNet-like structure to capture long-range dependencies.

tools.name: Swin-UMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Mamba-based UNet with ImageNet-based pretraining for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A medical image segmentation model that combines Swin Transformer and Mamba architectures to enhance global context modeling.

tools.name: IterativeSolvers.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative algorithms for solving linear systems and eigensystems in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing iterative solvers for linear systems, eigensystems, and singular value problems, essential for large-scale scientific simulations.

tools.name: Conda.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Conda environment manager integration for Julia
tools.detailed_description: Allows Julia packages to use Conda to manage their binary dependencies, facilitating the integration of Python-based scientific tools within Julia workflows.

tools.name: KrylovKit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Krylov methods for linear problems and eigenvalues in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing Krylov subspace methods for solving linear systems and eigenvalue problems, widely used in quantum physics and chemistry simulations.

tools.name: CMake
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform build system widely used in scientific software
tools.detailed_description: A powerful build system generator used to manage the build process of software using a compiler-independent method, essential for compiling HPC scientific codes.

tools.name: uberenv
tools.one_line_profile: Automates Spack for building and deploying scientific software
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by LLNL to simplify and automate the use of the Spack package manager for building complex scientific software stacks on HPC systems.

tools.name: PointMamba
tools.one_line_profile: State Space Model for Point Cloud Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework applying the Mamba architecture to 3D point cloud analysis, offering efficient processing for tasks like classification and segmentation.

tools.name: PSCondaEnvs
tools.one_line_profile: PowerShell scripts for managing Conda environments
tools.detailed_description: Provides native PowerShell integration for Conda environment management, facilitating scientific Python workflows on Windows systems.

tools.name: LUMI-SoftwareStack
tools.one_line_profile: Setup scripts for the LUMI supercomputer software stack
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and tools to deploy and manage the LMOD-based module system and EasyBuild setup on the LUMI EuroHPC supercomputer.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for digital signal processing and parameter estimation, including methods like SSA, DMD, and EMD, used in physics and engineering data analysis.

tools.name: ngmo-environments
tools.one_line_profile: Environment management for Met Office Momentum project
tools.detailed_description: Tools and configurations for managing scientific computing environments for the Next Generation Modelling Systems (Momentum) at the Met Office.

tools.name: guix
tools.one_line_profile: Transactional package manager for reproducible builds
tools.detailed_description: GNU Guix is a transactional package manager and distribution of the GNU system, widely used in HPC for creating reproducible scientific software environments.

tools.name: cookiecutter-cms
tools.one_line_profile: Project template for Computational Molecular Science
tools.detailed_description: A Cookiecutter template designed by MolSSI to standardize the creation of Python packages for computational molecular science, ensuring best practices.

tools.name: facemap
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for predicting neural activity from orofacial movements
tools.detailed_description: A tool for tracking mouse orofacial movements and predicting neural activity, including SVD analysis of behavioral videos, used in neuroscience research.

tools.name: LightM-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Mamba UNet for Medical Image Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight medical image segmentation model that integrates Mamba modules into a UNet architecture for efficient processing.

tools.name: VMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Visual State Space Models based on Mamba
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose vision backbone based on the Mamba architecture, applicable to various scientific imaging tasks requiring efficient global context modeling.

tools.name: Remote Sensing Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Mamba architecture applied to Remote Sensing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Mamba architecture specifically adapted for remote sensing tasks, such as analyzing satellite or aerial imagery.

tools.name: HPC Container Maker
tools.one_line_profile: Generates Dockerfiles and Singularity recipes for HPC
tools.detailed_description: A tool by NVIDIA to simplify the creation of container specifications (Docker/Singularity) optimized for HPC environments and scientific applications.

tools.name: MambaVision
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Mamba-Transformer Vision Backbone
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid vision backbone combining Mamba and Transformer architectures, designed for high performance in computer vision tasks, applicable to scientific imaging.

tools.name: Nix
tools.one_line_profile: Purely functional package manager for reproducible builds
tools.detailed_description: A package manager that ensures reproducibility and reliability, increasingly used in scientific computing to manage complex software environments and dependencies.

tools.name: Nixtla
tools.one_line_profile: Time series forecasting and analysis tools (TimeGPT)
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for time series forecasting, including the TimeGPT foundation model, applicable to scientific data such as weather, energy, and IoT metrics.

tools.name: VideoMamba
tools.one_line_profile: State Space Model for efficient video understanding and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model based on Mamba architecture designed for efficient video understanding tasks, serving as a foundational tool for computer vision research.

tools.name: video-mamba-suite
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive suite for video modeling with Mamba architecture
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing various Mamba-based models for video analysis, facilitating research in efficient video representation learning.

tools.name: DeepTab
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for tabular data analysis and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package simplifying tabular deep learning with a suite of models (Mambular, TabM, etc.) for regression and classification tasks in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: pbbioconda
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio bioinformatics tools package repository
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Conda recipes for Pacific Biosciences secondary analysis tools, facilitating environment management for genomics research.

tools.name: pawsey-spack-config
tools.one_line_profile: Spack configuration for Pawsey Supercomputing Centre
tools.detailed_description: Automated deployment configurations for the scientific software stack at Pawsey, ensuring reproducible HPC environments.

tools.name: guix-install-action
tools.one_line_profile: GitHub Action for setting up GNU Guix in CI workflows
tools.detailed_description: A CI/CD tool enabling the installation of GNU Guix in GitHub Actions, facilitating reproducible testing and build environments for scientific software.

tools.name: rocm-spack-pkgs
tools.one_line_profile: Spack recipes for ROCm software stack
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting Spack package recipes for the ROCm platform, enabling the deployment of GPU-accelerated scientific applications.

tools.name: neurodocker
tools.one_line_profile: Container generator for neuroimaging and scientific software
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to generate custom Docker and Singularity images for neuroimaging and other scientific research, promoting reproducibility.

tools.name: spackenv
tools.one_line_profile: Environment management wrapper for Spack
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by SJTU HPC to switch environments between sysadmin, users, and developers using Spack, enhancing HPC workflow management.

tools.name: Create-A-Container
tools.one_line_profile: Recipes for building custom Singularity/Apptainer containers
tools.detailed_description: A repository of scripts and recipes for building containers for specific HPC environments (CREATE HPC), facilitating reproducible research workflows.

tools.name: Singular
tools.one_line_profile: Computer algebra system for polynomial computations
tools.detailed_description: A computer algebra system for polynomial computations, with special emphasis on commutative and non-commutative algebra, algebraic geometry, and singularity theory.

tools.name: SkyText-Chinese-GPT3
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese GPT-3 pre-trained large language model
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained large language model for Chinese text generation, translation, and reasoning tasks, serving as a foundational model for NLP research.

tools.name: docker-builds
tools.one_line_profile: Dockerfiles for public health bioinformatics tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Dockerfiles and documentation for building containers for public health bioinformatics, ensuring reproducibility in genomic epidemiology.

tools.name: e4s
tools.one_line_profile: E4S Spack environments and container recipes
tools.detailed_description: Configuration and recipes for the Extreme-scale Scientific Software Stack (E4S), providing Spack environments and containers for high-performance computing.

tools.name: MogaNet
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Multi-order Gated Aggregation Network
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision model designed for efficient feature aggregation, applicable to image classification and object detection tasks in research.

tools.name: MedMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Vision Mamba for Medical Image Classification
tools.detailed_description: A specialized deep learning model applying the Mamba architecture to medical image classification tasks, aiding in medical diagnosis research.

tools.name: BlackMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Mixture-of-Experts State Space Model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the BlackMamba architecture, combining State Space Models with Mixture-of-Experts for efficient sequence modeling.

tools.name: rde
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible Development Environments manager
tools.detailed_description: A tool wrapper around GNU Guix to manage reproducible development environments, ensuring consistency across scientific computing setups.

tools.name: pssa
tools.one_line_profile: Singular Spectrum Analysis for time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Singular Spectrum Analysis (SSA) for time series decomposition and forecasting in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: AI-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Portable AI workflows for testing and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A collection of real-world AI workflows designed for benchmarking and testing HPC/AI infrastructure, developed by the Alan Turing Institute.

tools.name: nb_conda_kernels
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter extension to manage Conda environments as kernels
tools.detailed_description: A package that enables Jupyter to automatically detect and use Conda environments as kernels, facilitating reproducible interactive scientific computing.

tools.name: Apptainer
tools.one_line_profile: Container system for High Performance Computing (HPC)
tools.detailed_description: The open-source container system (formerly Singularity) designed for HPC environments, enabling reproducible and portable scientific workflows.

tools.name: Singularity
tools.one_line_profile: Container platform for scientific and HPC workloads (Legacy Snapshot)
tools.detailed_description: The predecessor to Apptainer, widely used in scientific computing for creating and running containers that package scientific software and data.

tools.name: Bactopia
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for bacterial genome analysis, including quality control, assembly, and annotation.

tools.name: unidep
tools.one_line_profile: Unified dependency management for Pip and Conda
tools.detailed_description: A tool to manage dependencies for scientific Python projects, handling both pip and conda requirements in a single file to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: apptainer-conda
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to create local Conda environments via Apptainer
tools.detailed_description: A tool that facilitates the creation and usage of Conda environments encapsulated within Apptainer containers, enhancing reproducibility in HPC.

tools.name: rrtools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for writing reproducible research in R
tools.detailed_description: A package that provides instructions, templates, and functions for making a compendium suitable for writing reproducible research with R.

tools.name: Master of Pores
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for direct RNA Nanopore read analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing direct RNA sequencing data from Nanopore, including basecalling, mapping, and modification detection.

tools.name: Graph-Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Long-Range Graph Sequence Modelling with Selective State Spaces
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model adapting the Mamba architecture for graph data, applicable to molecular modeling and other scientific graph problems.

tools.name: U-Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Mamba-based model for biomedical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid CNN-Mamba network for biomedical image segmentation, capturing long-range dependencies efficiently.

tools.name: irlba
tools.one_line_profile: Fast truncated singular value decomposition (SVD) library
tools.detailed_description: A library for implicitly restarted Lanczos bidiagonalization augmented methods, widely used for dimensionality reduction in large-scale scientific data (e.g., genomics).

tools.name: cmcrameri
tools.one_line_profile: Perceptually uniform colourmaps for geosciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing Fabio Crameri's perceptually uniform colourmaps, designed to accurately represent scientific data without visual distortion.

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial genomes-to-report pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for comparative genomics of microbial isolates, generating comprehensive reports from genomic data.

tools.name: SMASH
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel software for quantum chemistry calculations
tools.detailed_description: Scalable Many-body Ab-initio Simulation code designed for massively parallel supercomputers to perform quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: EasyBuild
tools.one_line_profile: Software build and installation framework for HPC systems
tools.detailed_description: EasyBuild is a software build and installation framework that allows you to manage (scientific) software on High Performance Computing (HPC) systems in an efficient way.

tools.name: EasyBuild Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Core Python framework for the EasyBuild software installation system
tools.detailed_description: The core framework of EasyBuild, providing the logic for building and installing software in a structured and robust way on HPC systems.

tools.name: py2spack
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Python packages to Spack recipes
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically convert standard Python packages (PyPI) into Spack package recipes, facilitating the deployment of Python scientific stacks on HPC.

tools.name: nixpack
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of Nix and Spack for scientific software management
tools.detailed_description: A tool that combines the Nix package manager with Spack to provide reproducible environments for scientific computing.

tools.name: SegMamba
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Medical Image Segmentation using Mamba architecture
tools.detailed_description: A long-range sequential modeling framework based on Mamba for 3D medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: Popper
tools.one_line_profile: Container-native task automation engine for scientific reproducibility
tools.detailed_description: A tool for defining and executing container-native workflows, specifically designed to support scientific reproducibility and experimentation pipelines.

tools.name: HOOMD-blue
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose particle simulation toolkit optimized for GPUs, supporting molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo simulations for soft matter research.

tools.name: rstudio-server-conda
tools.one_line_profile: Docker image running RStudio Server in a Conda environment
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Docker image that integrates RStudio Server with Conda, allowing for reproducible scientific statistical analysis environments with managed dependencies.

tools.name: guix-science
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific package channel for GNU Guix
tools.detailed_description: A channel for the GNU Guix package manager containing free scientific software packages, facilitating reproducible software deployment in HPC and research environments.

tools.name: Cobra
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal Large Language Model extending Mamba
tools.detailed_description: An efficient multi-modal large language model architecture that extends the Mamba state space model for optimized inference in scientific and general AI tasks.

tools.name: LocalMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Visual State Space Model with Windowed Selective Scan
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a visual state space model that improves local dependency modeling in images, applicable to computer vision tasks in scientific analysis.

tools.name: Vim (Vision Mamba)
tools.one_line_profile: Bidirectional State Space Model for visual representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A vision backbone architecture based on Mamba that offers efficient visual representation learning, suitable for high-resolution scientific image analysis.

tools.name: Singularity-Model
tools.one_line_profile: Video-and-Language Learning Model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Singularity model for revealing single frame bias in video-and-language learning, applicable to multimodal data analysis.

tools.name: berryconda
tools.one_line_profile: Conda distribution for Raspberry Pi
tools.detailed_description: A Conda-based Python distribution specifically for Raspberry Pi, enabling scientific computing and package management on edge devices.

tools.name: mamba-minimal
tools.one_line_profile: Minimal PyTorch implementation of Mamba SSM
tools.detailed_description: A concise and self-contained implementation of the Mamba State Space Model, serving as a reference solver for sequence modeling tasks.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for automated quantum mechanical calculations, including conformer generation, input creation, and output processing for computational chemistry.

tools.name: apptainer-in-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Run Apptainer within Docker containers
tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling the use of Apptainer (formerly Singularity), the standard HPC container system, inside Docker environments, facilitating CI/CD for scientific workflows.

tools.name: key4hep-spack
tools.one_line_profile: Spack recipes for Key4hep software stack
tools.detailed_description: A repository of Spack package recipes for the Key4hep project, enabling the deployment of consistent software stacks for High Energy Physics.

tools.name: pymssa
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Singular Spectrum Analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Multivariate Singular Spectrum Analysis (MSSA) for time series decomposition and forecasting in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: MultiModalMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Fused ViT and Mamba Multi-Modal Model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation fusing Vision Transformers with Mamba architecture for high-performance multi-modal AI modeling.

tools.name: VisionMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Visual Representation Learning with Bidirectional SSM
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Vision Mamba architecture for efficient visual representation learning, offering faster inference and lower memory usage for image analysis.

tools.name: MobileMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Multi-Receptive Visual Mamba Network
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight implementation of the Visual Mamba network optimized for mobile or resource-constrained environments in computer vision tasks.

tools.name: libigl-python-bindings
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for libigl geometry processing library
tools.detailed_description: Python interface for libigl, a comprehensive C++ library for geometry processing, mesh manipulation, and scientific visualization.

tools.name: crocoddyl
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal control library for robot control
tools.detailed_description: A library for optimal control of complex systems, specifically robots, using Differential Dynamic Programming (DDP) algorithms.

tools.name: boa
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Conda package builder based on Mamba
tools.detailed_description: A tool for building Conda packages using the Mamba solver, significantly speeding up the package creation process for scientific software distribution.

tools.name: Gator
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter extension for managing Conda environments and packages within the notebook interface
tools.detailed_description: Gator is a Jupyter extension that provides a graphical interface for Conda environment management directly within JupyterLab and Jupyter Notebook. It allows researchers to create, update, and manage scientific software environments without leaving their data analysis workspace, enhancing reproducibility and workflow efficiency.

tools.name: Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance, cross-platform package manager for scientific computing environments
tools.detailed_description: Mamba is a reimplementation of the Conda package manager in C++, designed to drastically improve the speed of dependency solving and package installation. It is a critical tool in the scientific Python and R ecosystem for creating reproducible environments for high-performance computing and data science.

tools.name: micromamba-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure for building minimal, reproducible Conda-based containers
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides the tooling and base images for creating small, efficient Docker containers using Micromamba. It is essential for deploying scientific applications in containerized HPC and cloud environments, ensuring consistent runtime environments for research software.

tools.name: Quetz
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source server for hosting and managing Conda package channels
tools.detailed_description: Quetz is a server implementation for Conda packages, allowing scientific organizations to host private or public package channels. It supports artifact management, access control, and metadata handling, serving as a foundational platform for distributing scientific software within research groups.

tools.name: Syndeo
tools.one_line_profile: Orchestration tool for running Ray workloads on Slurm with Apptainer
tools.detailed_description: Syndeo enables the execution of massively parallel jobs using the Ray framework on Slurm-managed HPC clusters. It leverages Apptainer for secure containerization, bridging modern AI compute frameworks with traditional scientific HPC schedulers.

tools.name: mp-units
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for dimensional analysis and physical unit systems
tools.detailed_description: mp-units is a compile-time dimensional analysis library for C++ that enforces type safety for physical quantities. It is critical for scientific modeling and simulation software to prevent unit conversion errors and ensure physical correctness in calculations.

tools.name: repo2apptainer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert repositories into Apptainer images for HPC reproducibility
tools.detailed_description: Repo2apptainer is a wrapper around repo2docker that generates Apptainer (formerly Singularity) images from source repositories. It facilitates the transfer of reproducible computational environments from local development (Jupyter) to HPC clusters.

tools.name: Nextflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow orchestration engine for data-driven computational pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Nextflow is a domain-specific language and runtime for defining and executing complex computational pipelines. It abstracts the underlying compute infrastructure (HPC, Cloud, Kubernetes) and is the standard for building reproducible scientific workflows, particularly in bioinformatics and data science.

tools.name: Sarek
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for germline and somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: Sarek is a production-grade analysis pipeline built with Nextflow for detecting germline or somatic variants from whole genome or targeted sequencing data. It integrates multiple scientific tools (GATK, Strelka, etc.) into a reproducible workflow.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Profiler for analyzing non-covalent interactions in PDB files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze and visualize non-covalent protein-ligand interactions in 3D structures, widely used in drug discovery and structural biology.

tools.name: PRIMME
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance library for solving large-scale Hermitian eigenvalue and singular value problems
tools.detailed_description: PReconditioned Iterative MultiMethod Eigensolver. A high-performance library for computing a few eigenvalues/eigenvectors and singular values/vectors, essential for quantum chemistry and physics simulations.

tools.name: PyAMG
tools.one_line_profile: Algebraic Multigrid (AMG) solvers for large sparse linear systems in Python
tools.detailed_description: A library of Algebraic Multigrid (AMG) solvers for large sparse linear systems, commonly used in scientific simulations like fluid dynamics and physics modeling.

tools.name: What the Phage
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible workflow for bacteriophage identification and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based bioinformatics workflow for easy-to-use and reproducible identification and annotation of bacteriophages from sequencing data.

tools.name: law
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for large-scale physics analysis on HPC
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to build large-scale task workflows based on Luigi, featuring remote job submission, remote targets, and environment sandboxing using Docker and Singularity, tailored for High Energy Physics.

tools.name: spack-manager
tools.one_line_profile: Management tool for Spack environments and deployments
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by Sandia National Laboratories to manage Spack environments and machine deployments, facilitating the maintenance of scientific software stacks on HPC systems.

tools.name: Shogun
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale machine learning toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning library with a focus on Support Vector Machines (SVMs) and kernel methods, historically widely used in bioinformatics and scientific data analysis.

tools.name: docker2singularity
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Docker images to Singularity format
tools.detailed_description: A tool (packaged as a Docker image) to convert Docker images into Singularity images, essential for migrating containerized scientific workflows to HPC environments.

tools.name: singularity-hpc
tools.one_line_profile: HPC container registry and module management tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to manage a local filesystem registry for Singularity containers on HPC, automatically generating Lmod or Environment Modules to make containers accessible as modules.

tools.name: sregistry
tools.one_line_profile: Singularity image registry server
tools.detailed_description: An open-source registry server and client for managing and storing Singularity images, designed for scientific institutions to host their own container collections.

tools.name: Spack
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible package manager for HPC
tools.detailed_description: A multi-platform package manager that supports multiple versions, configurations, platforms, and compilers, specifically designed to handle the complex dependency graphs of scientific software on HPC systems.

tools.name: Pinocchio
tools.one_line_profile: Rigid body dynamics algorithms library
tools.detailed_description: A fast and flexible C++ library (with Python bindings) for rigid body dynamics algorithms and their analytical derivatives, widely used in robotics and biomechanics research.

tools.name: Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: State Space Model (SSM) architecture implementation
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the Mamba architecture, a state space model for sequence modeling that serves as a foundational building block for various AI for Science applications (e.g., genomics, protein modeling).

tools.name: SingularityCE
tools.one_line_profile: Container platform for HPC and scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: The Community Edition of Singularity, a container platform designed for High Performance Computing (HPC) environments, enabling reproducible scientific workflows with support for MPI and specialized hardware.

tools.name: Banpei
tools.one_line_profile: Anomaly detection library based on Singular Spectrum Transformation (SST)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Singular Spectrum Transformation (SST) for change-point detection in time-series data, applicable to signal processing and data analysis tasks.

tools.name: TUCCA RNA-Seq
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq workflow for quantification and differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-Seq analysis workflow covering read quantification, differential expression analysis, and pathway enrichment, designed for transcriptomics research.

tools.name: UltraLight VM-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Vision Mamba network for skin lesion segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of UltraLight VM-UNet, a lightweight medical image segmentation model combining Vision Mamba and U-Net architectures for efficient skin lesion analysis.

tools.name: S-D-Mamba
tools.one_line_profile: Mamba-based model for time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a State Space Model (Mamba) adapted for time series forecasting tasks, evaluating the effectiveness of SSMs in temporal data analysis.

tools.name: MambaOut
tools.one_line_profile: Vision backbone architecture analyzing Mamba's necessity
tools.detailed_description: A computer vision model architecture that empirically analyzes the necessity of Mamba (State Space Models) in vision tasks compared to convolution and attention mechanisms.

tools.name: Sigma
tools.one_line_profile: Siamese Mamba Network for Multi-Modal Semantic Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing Siamese Mamba networks for multi-modal semantic segmentation, particularly applicable in medical imaging and RGB-T scenarios.

tools.name: Mamba-UNet
tools.one_line_profile: Mamba-enhanced U-Net for medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of U-Net architectures integrated with Mamba (State Space Models) blocks to enhance long-range dependency modeling in medical image segmentation tasks.
